ygData.subject: Re: Magic Items for the Paladin
ygData.msgSnippet: My gloves were purchased off a player, but I here that they are a rare grab at PAW dungeon. They give a +3 to Dex as well as having the AC of Raw Hide I think
ygData.messageBody:
My gloves were purchased off a player, but I here that they are a rare grab
at PAW dungeon. They give a +3 to Dex as well as having the AC of Raw Hide
I think they added to my poison resistance also.

-Dyce

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rodney Miller [SMTP:RMiller@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 3:14 PM
> To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: Magic Items for the Paladin
>
> From: Rodney Miller <RMiller@...>
>
> where did you get the snakeskin gloves?
>
> Grod
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chris Ferriera [mailto:cferriera@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 2:02 PM
> To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: Magic Items for the Paladin
>
>
> From: Chris Ferriera <cferriera@...>
>
>
> > Has anyone aquired any of the Magical Paladin Weapons? Or any good magic
> > weapons at all? Im level 11 and the best things Ive gotten so far are a
> > Mino Axe, Snake Skin Gloves, and a Cutthroat Insignia Ring. I would
> really
> > to get hold of some weapon with charges or something, something special,
> > but I feel at level 11 that is quite impossible.
> >
> > -Dyce
